title: A prospective, single-centre study of the feasibility of the use of augmented reality for improving the safety and traceability of injectable investigational cancer drug compounding
content:
Publication date: 15 July 2024

Source: Heliyon, Volume 10, Issue 13

Author(s): Arthur Lecoutre, Michele Vasseur, Justin Courtin, Slim Hammadi, Bertrand Decaudin, Odou Pascal
